descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Mo Bamba drives to the basket to flush a two-handed dunk for the Magic to give them an early 13-12 lead over the Lakers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mo Bamba drives for powerful 2-handed slam) 2021/03/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mo Bamba drives for powerful 2-handed slam
